body_content.explanation: coming from or relating to people whose family originally came from the Far East, Southeast Asia, South Asia, or the Pacific Islands, especially people who are living in the United States:
examples: Most of her students were of Asian-Pacific ancestry.
The festival is a celebration of Asian-Pacific culture.
This is a subject of great interest to many in the Asian Pacific community.

body_content.explanation: relating or belonging to a business region that includes Asia and the Pacific Rim (= the countries on the edge of the Pacific Ocean, including Australia and the west coast of the US as well as the small nations of East Asia):
examples: European markets tumbled, and Asian-Pacific stocks also finished lower for the day.
The China plant will serve the Asian-Pacific market.
The leaders of 22 Asian Pacific economies attended the summit.
